name: linter-ruff
description: A wrapper around Python linter called ruff

state.title: Linter state
state.description: Enable or disable the service of linter.

executable.title: Path to executable
executable.description: Make sure `ruff` executable is available from command line.

pyVersion.title: Python version
pyVersion.description: The minimum Python version that should be supported.

select.title: Rule selection: Select
select.description: Comma-separated list of rule codes to enable or `ALL` to enable all rules. Leave empty if you want use configuration files.

ignore.title: Rule selection: Ignore
ignore.description: Comma-separated list of rule codes to disable.

fixable.title: Rule selection: Fixable
fixable.description: Comma-separated list of rule codes to treat as eligible for autofix.

unfixable.title: Rule selection: Unfixable
unfixable.description: Comma-separated list of rule codes to treat as ineligible for autofix.

error.title: Severity selection: Error
error.description: Comma-separated list of rule codes to treat as error type.

warning.title: Severity selection: Warning
warning.description: Comma-separated list of rule codes to treat as warning type.

info.title: Severity selection: Info
info.description: Comma-separated list of rule codes to treat as info type.

useNoqa.title: Use noqa flag
useNoqa.description: Flag `# noqa` is used to silent linter messages per line.

addStar.title: Unclassified flags marked by star
addStar.description: Add star to all flags which user do not classified yet.

allowMagic.title: Allow magic commands
allowMagic.description: A bypass of magic commands e.g. `%timeit`, `_`.
